data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Wakefit Innovations Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 15 2025 the Equity Shares of Wakefit Innovations Ltd (Scrip Code: 544642) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251212-16 dated December 12 2025.
